column1: us; first person plural; multiple entities including the speaker
y'all; second person plural; multiple entities including the listener but not the speaker
them; third person plural; multiple entities including neither the speaker nor listener
bless; yay; okay; positive exclamative mood
fuck; boo; not; negative exclamative mood
say; tell; declare; give information; SBJ (lecturer) tells IND (tellee) that OBJ (fact; opinion; notion; sentence) is true; give information
ask; interrogate; SBJ (curious; interrogator) asks IND (questionee) OBJ (question)
tell; implore; command; instruct; SBJ (boss; commander) tells IND (instructee) to make OBJ (command; instruction) happen
request; SBJ (requester) politely asks IND (requestee) to make OBJ (request) happen
be feminine; OBJ (woman; girl) is feminine
be masculine; OBJ (man; boy) is masculine
be hallowed; worship; OBJ (worshiper) worships SBJ
national; SBJ (national) identifies as part of OBJ (nation; tribe; clan; e.g. Kurdistan, Tibet)
citizen; SBJ (citizen) legally belongs to OBJ (state; sovereign; polity; e.g. India, The Vatican)
tempt; entice to something appealing but immoral; SBJ (tempter; temptress) encourages IND (temptee) to do OBJ (temptation)
air; atmosphere; nitrogen and oxygen and all that jazz
sculpt; etch; carve; SBJ (carver) carves OBJ (sculpture)
be found; OBJ knows where SBJ is
go through; OBJ moves into and then out of IND (tube; hallway; corridor)
travel; SBJ travels from IND to OBJ (destination; getaway)
advertise; SBJ (advertiser) advertises IND (advertisement) to OBJ (advertisee)
